post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Object Solutions is a fast-growing IT company offering software
application development and software consulting services. We are in
immediate need of 25 full-time J2EE developers and IT Project
Managers.

We are looking to hire talented and dynamic developers who enjoy
working in a team but are also able to work independently with
limited supervision.  You should enjoy a challenge and have the
desire to work with a progressive company with a promising future.  
If you think you have what we are looking for, please confirm your
attendance to the job fair on May 13, 2006. An onsite interview
will be conducted on and qualified candidates will be selected
immediately.

No Canadian experience is required but solid specialized skills.

Time: May 13, 2006
Location: 265 Yorkland Blvd., Suite 301, Toronto, ON M2J 1A5
Organizer: Object Solutions
Sponsor: Toronto College of Technology
Contact: Tony P.
Tel: 416-225.-9920
Email: info@objectsolution.com
Website: www.objectsolution.com
post.title: 25 Immediate Positions of J2EE Developer (The date was over but try to apply!!)
